plot: Why don't the adults have any time to play? Why do they do things that children are not allowed to do? Why does everything always have to be tidy? And why is money the most important thing ...
title: Groß & dumm
plot_es: Why don't the adults have any time to play? Why do they do things that children are not allowed to do? Why does everything always have to be tidy? And why is money the most important thing ...
plot_en: Why don't the adults have any time to play? Why do they do things that children are not allowed to do? Why does everything always have to be tidy? And why is money the most important thing ...
